category: Regulations of member city/provincial sports associations/Article 35 (Organization and composition of city/county/district sports associations)
contents: Article 35 (Organization and Composition of City/County/District Sports Council) ① The city/county/district sports council, which is a member of the city/provincial sports council, has city/county/district sports organizations as members, and has the town/myeon/dong sports council under its umbrella. can be placed. Revised on October 6, 2021 ② The city/county/district sports council may establish a school sports committee and a living sports committee as advisory bodies to the board of directors. [Moved from paragraph 3, previous paragraph 2 deleted May 15, 2017. ] ③ Deleted 2021. 10. 6. ④ The term of office, grounds for disqualification, organization, operation, etc. of executives of city/county/district sports councils shall be separately determined by the city/provincial sports council in accordance with these regulations. Revised 2021. 10. 6., 2022. 5. 10.
